snippet.title: Titan Quest II | Showcase 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Set out on an adventure worthy of myth and take control of your own fate.
 
Create your hero and modify your abilities to come up with unique builds. Wield weapons of legend and battle mythical monsters. Grow your powers from those of a young mortal to a hero to rival the gods themselves!

Titan Quest II coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist now! 
 
- Links & Info -  
Steam: thqn.net/tq2-steam 
Website: titanquest2.thqnordic.com 
Discord: discord.gg/titanquest 
  
- Socials -  
YouTube: youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: twitter.com/TitanQuestGame 
Facebook: facebook.com/TitanQuestOfficial 
Instagram: instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: twitch.tv/thqnordic
Threads: threads.net/@thqnordic
  
#TitanQuest #THQNordic2024
